title: F/S - T201 - Huggins / Bresnahan - SGC 84 NM - SOLD

posts.post_title: F/S - T201 - Huggins / Bresnahan - SGC 84 NM - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Very nice T201 double HOF'er for sale.  Pictures Miller Huggins / Roger Bresnahan of the St. Louis Cardinals.  Graded SGC 84 NM.  Price is $280 whcih includes shipping.  Paypal (gift) or checks / money orders accepted.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@neo.rr.com[/url] .
